subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Hazzard was a former U.C.L.A. and N.B.A. star who played on the Bruins’ first N.C.A.A. championship basketball team in 1964 and later coached the team for four seasons in the 1980s.
snippet: Hazzard was a former U.C.L.A. and N.B.A. star who played on the Bruins’ first N.C.A.A. championship basketball team in 1964 and later coached the team for four seasons in the 1980s.
